#summary How to run the App in your own machine
Before being able to run the app successfully, you must register the app URL with OAuth Providers (Facebook, Google, Twitter etc.).  It is necessary because OAuth protocol works by Web redirection and the provider will redirect to the registered URL after successful authentication.

Here is a screenshot of an application registration window with Facebook:

[http://gwtoauthlogindemo.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/facebook-app-register.png]

After successful authentication Facebook will redirect the app the URL specified in *Site URL:* field.
